titles.title: To reauthorize the White House Conference on Small Business Authorization Act, and for other purposes.
White House Conference on Small Business Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary:
White House Conference on Small Business Act of 2018
This bill reestablishes the National White House Conference on Small Business.
